src:
Nema više poigravanja za Real, Sveci imaju prolaz na tacni
Večeras bismo manje-više mogli da dobijemo kompletan rasplet u Grupi A

06 Nov 2019

Sveci su perfektni u Ligi šampiona. I to u svakom smislu. Pored toga što su upisali sva tri trijumfa u dosadašnjem toku takmičenja, Parižani nisu primili nijedan pogodak, a deluju sasvim impresivno i u napadu gde su došli do čak devet golova. Kada se sve sabere, čini se da će Klub Briž večeras u glavnom gradu Francuske biti samo puki „prolaznik“ (Arena Sport 4, 21.00).
Za razliku od prethodnog okršaja sa istim rivalom u Belgiji, PSŽ u ovaj ulazi nakon manjeg kiksa u domaćem šampionatu gde je poražen od ekipe Dižona nakon preokreta. Ruku na srce, to može da bude samo dodatni motiv Parižanima da pokažu zube i obezbede plasman u narednu fazu takmičenja.
Iza Svetaca je i fantastična tradicija koja kaže da PSŽ nije izgubio u grupnoj fazi takmičenja na domaćem terenu u poslednja 22 susreta. Poslednji neuspeh desio se sada već davne 2004. godine kada je CSKA iz Moskve uspeo da odnese sva tri boda sa „Parka prinčeva“.
Tomas Tuhel neće moći da računa na Čupo-Motanga, kao ni na Paredesa, ali bi i sa sastavom koji im je trenutno na raspolaganju morali veoma lako da dođu do pobede protiv Klub Briža.
Real Madrid nikako ne blista od početka nove sezone. Taman što uđe u seriju dobrih rezultata usledi neki prilično šokantan kiks, što kao da je prešlo u konstantnu za Kraljeviće. Ni u četvrto kolo Lige šampiona, Madriđani ne ulaze u dobrom raspoloženju, pošto su za vikend u Primeri odigrali „samo“ nerešeno protiv Betisa - 0:0.
Da sve bude još interesantnije, Realu još uvek visi plasman u nokaut fazu takmičenja, pošto nakon tri kola ima samo četiri osvojena boda u Ligi šampiona, a stanje je moglo biti još gore da je Klub Briž uspeo da se „sačuva“ u drugom kolu kada je imao dva gola prednosti.
Još pri samom pogledu na sastav Reala, jasno je da je na „Santjago Bernabeuu“ otvorena bolnica. Van stroja su neki od najboljih igrača poput Marka Asensija i Gereta Bejla. Međutim, bez obzira na to, Galatasaraj bi morao da padne u Madridu. U suprotnom, stanje u grupi bi se maksimalno zakomplikovalo.
A u jeku svih utakmica u ovoj grupi, stoji priča isključivo o jednom fudbaleru - Kilijanu Mbapeu. Nije tajna da se Real Madrid ozbiljno interesuje za usluge fudbalera PSŽ-a. Jedini problem koji se tu javlja jeste ugovor koji Francuza veže za pariski klub.
Dok se to ne razreši, ostaje da uživamo u fudbalu. Ko zna, možda Mbape večeras indirektno pomogne Realu da se približi stepenik bliže prolasku u narednu fazu takmičenja.

LIGA ŠAMPIONA, GRUPNA FAZA - 4. KOLO




GRUPA A

text:
No more playing for Real, the Saints have a pass on the plate
Tonight we could more or less get the full Group A U-turn

06 Nov 2019

The Saints are perfect in the Champions League. And in every sense. In addition to registering all three triumphs in the competition so far, the Parisians have not received a single shot, and they work quite impressively in the attack where they have scored as many as nine goals. When it all comes together, it seems that the Club Bruges tonight in the French capital will only be a mere "passer-by" (Arena Sport 4, 9pm).
Unlike the previous match with the same rival in Belgium, PSG enters this one after a minor match in the domestic championship where they were defeated by Dijon after the turn. Hand in heart, this can only be an additional motive for Parisians to show their teeth and secure placement in the next phase of the competition.
Behind the Saints is a fantastic tradition to say that PSG has not lost in the group stage of home competition in the last 22 matches. The last failure occurred now as long ago as 2004 when CSKA Moscow managed to take all three points from the Prince's Park.
Tomas Tuhel will not be able to count on Chupo-Motang as well as Paredes, but with the squad currently available to them, they would have to win the Club Brugge very easily.
Real Madrid have not shone since the start of the new season. Just about to enter the series of good results is followed by some rather shocking pixelation, which seems to have turned into a constant for Kraljevic. Even in the fourth round of the Champions League, the Madrid players are not in a good mood, as they played "just" a draw against Betis at the weekend in Primera - 0-0.
To make things even more interesting, Real Madrid are still in the knockout stages of the competition, as after three rounds they have only four points won in the Champions League, and the situation could have been worse that Club Brugge managed to "save" in the second round when had two goals.
Even when looking at the composition of Real, it is clear that a hospital was opened at the Santiago Bernabeu. Outside the machine are some of the best players like Mark Asensi and Geret Bale. Nonetheless, Galatasaray would have to fall in Madrid. Otherwise, the situation in the group would be maximally complicated.
And in the midst of all the games in this group, there is the story of only one footballer - Kilian Mbape. It's no secret that Real Madrid are seriously interested in the services of PSG football players. The only problem that arises here is the contract the Frenchman binds to the Paris club.
Until that is resolved, it remains for us to enjoy football. Who knows, maybe Mbape is indirectly helping tonight Real get a step closer to moving on to the next stage of the competition.

CHAMPIONS LEAGUE, GROUP PHASE - ROUND 4
